mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ck_consult_note_info where consultidx = #{idx} order by idx desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ck_consult_info ( idx, cons_status, cus_name, cus_age, cus_mobile, rec_manager, cons_day, cons_time, cons_team, cons_manager, regid, regdate ) VALUES ( (select ifnull(max(idx)+1, 1) from ck_consult_info a), #{cons_status}, #{cus_name}, #{cus_age}, #{cus_mobile}, #{rec_manager}, #{cons_day}, #{cons_time}, #{cons_team}, #{cons_manager}, #{regid}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ck_consult_info SET cons_status = #{cons_status}, cons_day = #{cons_day}, cons_time = #{cons_time}, cons_team = #{cons_team}, cons_manager = #{cons_manager} WHERE idx = #{idx};
UPDATE ck_consult_info SET cons_status = '99' WHERE idx = #{idx};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ck_consult_info where cons_day = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
